text:
Regional Transitional Cell Cancer of the Renal Pelvis and Ureter
		                    Treatment of regional transitional cell cancer of the renal pelvis and ureter is usually done in a clinical trial.   Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with regional transitional cell cancer of the renal pelvis and ureter. For more specific results, refine the search by using other search features, such as the location
